i cant figure it out since it is a vary minimal change between the water and the fishingspot...

item.title: Best way to find a fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Add the procedure ‘DeclarePlayers;’ (Without the quotes) somewhere in your setup procedure.

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to find a fishing spot

item.title: Best way to find a fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

yes it did thanks much.

EDIT: ok now for the out of range part here is the script:
[scar]
{=========================================================================]
[ Premier’s PowerChopper ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Premier’s PowerChopper ]
[ WRITER : Premier ]
[ CATEGORY : Woodcutting ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Cuts a load of logs then drops them ]
[ USAGE : gain woodcutting xp ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Start by the trees that you want to cut ]
[ CONTACT : MSN - troy.cos@hotmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Next Update : Fixing Bugs, autocolor ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers. ]
[ 4. SET HOWMANYPLAYERS inside DeclarePlayers ]
[ 5. Start script Logged Out! ]
[ 6. Setup Lines 32-35 ]
[=========================================================================}

program PowerChopper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/woodcutting.scar}

 const

rundir = ‘north’; //way you want to run if in fight
loadstodo = 4; //how many loads you want to do with each player + random 3 loads
chopwait = 2; //how many secconds you want to wait until you chop another tree
treecol1 = 0;
treecol2 = 0;
treecol3 = 0;

 var

load : integer;
username, treetocut : string;
lm : integer;
stlvl : integer;
logscut,exp : extended;
totexp : extended;

procedure declareplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=6;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;

 Players[0].Name :='yourname';
 Players[0].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[0].Nick :='urna';
 Players[0].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[0].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[0].Active:=True;
 
 Players[1].Name :='yourname';
 Players[1].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[1].Nick :='urna';
 Players[1].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[1].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[1].Active:=True;
 
 Players[2].Name :='yourname';
 Players[2].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[2].Nick :='urna';
 Players[2].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[2].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[2].Active:=True;
 
 Players[3].Name :='yourname';
 Players[3].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[3].Nick :='urna';
 Players[3].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[3].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[3].Active:=True;
 
 Players[4].Name :='yourname';
 Players[4].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[4].Nick :='urna';
 Players[4].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[4].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[4].Active:=True;
 
 Players[5].Name :='yourname';
 Players[5].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[5].Nick :='urna';
 Players[5].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[5].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[5].Active:=True;
 
 Writeln( IntToStr ( HowManyPlayers ) + ' Players' );

end;

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl;
FindAxeHeadColor;
end;

procedure setupplayer;
begin
username := Players[currentplayer].name
treetocut := players[currentplayer].skill
stlvl := getskilllevel(‘woodcutting’)
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘tree’ then exp := 25
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘oak’ then exp := 37.5
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘willow’ then exp := 67.5
end;

//thanks arr0w
Procedure Responderr;
Begin
If (InChat(‘Mining lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mining lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Mine lvls’) or
Inchat(‘Mine lvls?’))Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Mining’)))

If (InChat(‘Wc lvls’) or
InChat(‘Wc lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Woodcut lvls’) or
InChat(‘Woodcut lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Woodcutting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Woodcutting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Woodcutting’)))

If (InChat(‘Fish lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fish lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fishin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fishin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fishing lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fishing lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Fishing’)))

If (InChat(‘Attack lvls’) or
InChat(‘Attack lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Atack lvls’) or
InChat(‘Atack lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Attac lvls’) or
InChat(‘Attac lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Attack’)))

If (InChat(‘Strengh lvls’) or
InChat(‘Strengh lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Strengh’)))

If (InChat(‘Defenc lvls’) or
InChat(‘Defenc lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Defence lvls’) or
InChat(‘Defence lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Defence’)))

If (InChat(‘Hp lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hp lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoint lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoint lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoints lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoints lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitp lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitp lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Hitpoints’)))

If (InChat(‘Range lvls’) or
InChat(‘Range lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Rangin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Rangin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Ranged lvls’) or
InChat(‘Ranged lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Ranging lvls’) or
InChat(‘Ranging lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Ranged’)))

If (InChat(‘Pray lvls’) or
InChat(‘Pray lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Prayer lvls’) or
InChat(‘Prayer lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Prayer’)))

If (InChat(‘Mage lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mage lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Mag lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mag lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Magic lvls’) or
InChat(‘Magic lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Magic’)))

If (InChat(‘Cook lvls’) or
InChat(‘Cook lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Cookin lvls’) or
Inchat(‘Cookin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Cooking lvls’) or
InChat(‘Cooking lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Cooking’)))

If (InChat(‘Fletch lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fletch lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fletching lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fletching lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Fletching’)))

If (InChat(‘Firemaking lvls’) or
InChat(‘FireMaking lvls?’) or
Inchat(‘Fire making lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fire making lvls’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Firemaking’)))

If (InChat(‘Craft lvls’) or
InChat(‘Craftt lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Craftin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Crafting’)))

If (InChat(‘Smelt lvls’) or
InChat(‘Smelt lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Smelting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Smelting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Smelting’)))

If (InChat(‘Rc lvls’) or
InChat(‘Rc lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Runecraft lvls’) or
InChat(‘Runecraft lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Runecrafting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Runecrafting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Runecraft’)))

If (InChat(UserName + ‘?’))Then
TypeSend(‘Yeah?’)

If (InChat(‘Wna b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wna be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wana b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wana be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want 2 b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want 2 be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want to b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want to be freinds?’)) Then
TypeSend(‘No ty’)

If (InChat(‘hi’) or
InChat(‘hey’) or
InChat(‘heya’) or
InChat(‘hello’)) Then
TypeSend(‘hey’)

End;

Procedure Cuttum;
begin
repeat
If (FindFight) Then
begin
Runawaydirection(rundir)
Wait(25000+Random(5000))
RunBack;
end;
if (FindObjMulti(treetocut, treecol1, treecol2, treecol3, 5)) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
Findhead;
wait(250)
FindNormalRandoms;
mmouse(x,y,2,2)
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’, ‘hop’, ‘Cho’)) then
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
logscut := logscut+1
lm :=0
repeat
Wait(150)
Responderr;
lm := lm+150
until(lm >= chopwait*1000+random(500))
end;
until(invcount=28)
if not loggedin then
RandomNextPlayer(False);
end;

procedure getxp;
begin
totexp := exp*logscut
end;

Procedure Progress;
begin
writeln(’ You are using Premiers PowerChopper ‘)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
Srlrandomsreport;
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
writeln(‘Script has been working for ‘+ TimeRunning)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
writeln(‘This Report is for ’ + players[currentplayer].name)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has cut ’ + floattostr(logscut) + ’ logs.’)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has gained ’ + floattostr(totexp) + ’ experience.’)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has gained ’ + inttostr(getskilllevel(‘woodcutting’)-stlvl) + ’ levels.’)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
end;

procedure resetprvars;
begin
logscut := 0
end;

{mainloop----------------------------------------------------------------------}
begin
setup;
repeat
Setupplayer;
repeat
Cuttum;
if not (loggedin) then Break;
Dropalllogs;
load := load+1
until (load=loadstodo+random(3))

if (LoggedIn) then
begin
SetChat(‘off’, 1);
repeat
Wait(1000);
FindNormalRandoms;
until(not(LoggedIn));
Progress;
resetprvars;
NextPlayer(true);
end;

if (not(Loggedin)) then NextPlayer(false);
until(false)
end.
[/scar]

and i get:

[Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 106 in script E:\Programs\Scar 2.03\Scripts\my powerchopper(in prog).scar

p.s. that line is:

 username := Players[currentplayer].name

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to find a fishing spot

item.dc:creator: @premier premier
item.description:
@premier wrote:

hmm it does have to do with arrays but i cant figure it out… here is the script:
[scar]
{=========================================================================]
[ Premier’s PowerChopper ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Premier’s PowerChopper ]
[ WRITER : Premier ]
[ CATEGORY : Woodcutting ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Cuts a load of logs then drops them ]
[ USAGE : gain woodcutting xp ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ NOTES : Start by the trees that you want to cut ]
[ CONTACT : MSN - troy.cos@hotmail.com ]
[ ]
[ ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Next Update : Fixing Bugs, autocolor ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in DeclarePlayers. ]
[ 4. SET HOWMANYPLAYERS inside DeclarePlayers ]
[ 5. Start script Logged Out! ]
[ 6. Setup Lines 32-35 ]
[=========================================================================}

program PowerChopper;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/woodcutting.scar}

 const

rundir = ‘north’; //way you want to run if in fight
loadstodo = 4; //how many loads you want to do with each player + random 3 loads
chopwait = 2; //how many secconds you want to wait until you chop another tree
treecol1 = 0;
treecol2 = 0;
treecol3 = 0;

 var

load : integer;
username, treetocut : string;
lm : integer;
logscut,stlvl : integer;
exp : extended;

procedure declareplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers :=6;
NumberOfPlayers(HowManyPlayers);
CurrentPlayer:=0;

 Players[0].Name :='yourname';
 Players[0].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[0].Nick :='urna';
 Players[0].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[0].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[0].Active:=True;
 
 Players[1].Name :='yourname';
 Players[1].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[1].Nick :='urna';
 Players[1].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[1].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[1].Active:=True;
 
 Players[2].Name :='yourname';
 Players[2].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[2].Nick :='urna';
 Players[2].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[2].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[2].Active:=True;
 
 Players[3].Name :='yourname';
 Players[3].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[3].Nick :='urna';
 Players[3].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[3].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[3].Active:=True;
 
 Players[4].Name :='yourname';
 Players[4].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[4].Nick :='urna';
 Players[4].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[4].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[4].Active:=True;
 
 Players[5].Name :='yourname';
 Players[5].Pass :='yourpass';
 Players[5].Nick :='urna';
 Players[5].Loc  :='yourloc';         //leave
 Players[5].Skill:='yourskill';       //the kind of tree to cut(tree, oak, willow)
 Players[5].Active:=True;
 
 Writeln( IntToStr ( HowManyPlayers ) + ' Players' );

end;

procedure setup;
begin
setupsrl;
FindAxeHeadColor;
end;

procedure setupplayer;
begin
username := Players[currentplayer].name
treetocut := players[currentplayer].skill
stlvl := getskilllevel(‘woodcutting’)
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘tree’ then exp := 25
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘oak’ then exp := 37.5
if Players[currentplayer].Skill = ‘willow’ then exp := 67.5
end;

//thanks arr0w
Procedure Responderr;
Begin
If (InChat(‘Mining lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mining lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Mine lvls’) or
Inchat(‘Mine lvls?’))Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Mining’)))

If (InChat(‘Wc lvls’) or
InChat(‘Wc lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Woodcut lvls’) or
InChat(‘Woodcut lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Woodcutting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Woodcutting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Woodcutting’)))

If (InChat(‘Fish lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fish lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fishin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fishin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fishing lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fishing lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Fishing’)))

If (InChat(‘Attack lvls’) or

If (InChat(‘Strengh lvls’) or

If (InChat(‘Defenc lvls’) or

InChat(‘Defence lvls’) or
InChat(‘Defence lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Defence’)))

If (InChat(‘Hp lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hp lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoint lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoint lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoints lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitpoints lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Hitp lvls’) or
InChat(‘Hitp lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Hitpoints’)))

If (InChat(‘Range lvls’) or
InChat(‘Range lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Rangin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Rangin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Ranged lvls’) or
InChat(‘Ranged lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Ranging lvls’) or
InChat(‘Ranging lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Ranged’)))

If (InChat(‘Pray lvls’) or
InChat(‘Pray lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Prayer lvls’) or
InChat(‘Prayer lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Prayer’)))

If (InChat(‘Mage lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mage lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Mag lvls’) or
InChat(‘Mag lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Magic lvls’) or
InChat(‘Magic lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Magic’)))

If (InChat(‘Cook lvls’) or
InChat(‘Cook lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Cookin lvls’) or
Inchat(‘Cookin lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Cooking lvls’) or
InChat(‘Cooking lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Cooking’)))

If (InChat(‘Fletch lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fletch lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Fletching lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fletching lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Fletching’)))

If (InChat(‘Firemaking lvls’) or
InChat(‘FireMaking lvls?’) or
Inchat(‘Fire making lvls’) or
InChat(‘Fire making lvls’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Firemaking’)))

If (InChat(‘Craft lvls’) or
InChat(‘Craftt lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Craftin lvls’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Crafting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Crafting’)))

If (InChat(‘Smelt lvls’) or
InChat(‘Smelt lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Smelting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Smelting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Smelting’)))

If (InChat(‘Rc lvls’) or
InChat(‘Rc lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Runecraft lvls’) or
InChat(‘Runecraft lvls?’) or
InChat(‘Runecrafting lvls’) or
InChat(‘Runecrafting lvls?’)) Then
TypeSend(IntToStr(GetSkillLevel(‘Runecraft’)))

If (InChat(UserName + ‘?’))Then
TypeSend(‘Yeah?’)

If (InChat(‘Wna b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wna be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wana b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Wana be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want 2 b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want 2 be freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want to b freinds?’) or
InChat(‘Want to be freinds?’)) Then
TypeSend(‘No ty’)

If (InChat(‘hi’) or
InChat(‘hey’) or
InChat(‘heya’) or
InChat(‘hello’)) Then
TypeSend(‘hey’)

End;

Procedure Cuttum;
begin
repeat
If (FindFight) Then
begin
Runawaydirection(rundir)
Wait(25000+Random(5000))
RunBack;
end;
if (FindObjMulti(treetocut, treecol1, treecol2, treecol3, 5)) then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
Findhead;
wait(250)
FindNormalRandoms;
mmouse(x,y,2,2)
if (IsUpTextMulti(‘Chop’, ‘hop’, ‘Cho’)) then
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true)
logscut := logscut+1
lm :=0
repeat
Wait(150)
Responderr;
lm := lm+150
until(lm >= chopwait*1000+random(500))
end;
until(invcount=28)
if not loggedin then

end;

Procedure Progress;
begin
writeln(’ You are using Premiers PowerChopper ‘)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
Srlrandomsreport;
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
writeln(‘Script has been working for ‘+ TimeRunning)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
writeln(‘This Report is for ’ + players[currentplayer].name)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has cut ’ + inttostr(logscut) + ’ logs.’)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has gained ’ + inttostr(exp*logscut) + ’ experience.’)
writeln(players[currentplayer].name + ’ has gained ’ + inttostr(getskilllevel(‘woodcutting’)-stlvl) + ’ levels.’)
writeln(’-----------------------------------------------------------------’)
end;

procedure resetprvars;
begin
logscut := 0
end;

{mainloop----------------------------------------------------------------------}
begin
setup;
repeat
Setupplayer;
repeat
Cuttum;
if not (loggedin) then Break;
Dropalllogs;
load := load+1
until (load=loadstodo+random(3))

if (LoggedIn) then
begin
SetChat(‘off’, 1);
repeat
Wait(1000);
FindNormalRandoms;
until(not(LoggedIn));
Progress;
resetprvars;
NextPlayer(true);
end;

if (not(Loggedin)) then NextPlayer(false);
until(false)
end.
[/scar][br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 05:18:34 PM[/size][hr]wait… my prog report isnt working… (i just made it) is there a way to turn an extended variable into a string… like inttostr… but for extended variable

Read full topic
item.source: Best way to find a fishing spot

item.title: Best way to find a fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Out of Range means you’re calling on an array element that doesn’t exist:

[Scar]var
MyArray: Array of Integer;

begin
SetArrayLength(MyArray, 2); //This sets the length of ‘MyArray’ to 2, which means
//MyArray[0] and MyArray[1] exist.

MyArray[0] := 10; //This will work.
MyArray[1] := 11; //This will also work, because they have been defined.
MyArray[2] := 13; //This will NOT work, because it does not exist in memory yet.
//You will get a [Runtime Error]: Out Of Range error from that.
end.[/Scar]

I hope I explained that well, so look for a problem with arrays, and if you can’t get it, you could pm me the line of code or the procedure or something.

yah that will just get you to the area… im trying to click on the spot[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 01:32:34 PM[/size][hr]also what would somthing like: [Runtime Error] : Out Of Range in line 108 in script E:ProgramsScar 2.03Scriptsmy powerchopper(in prog).scar

mean?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 08, 2006, 02:49:29 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Weibs, post:2, topic:23070”]I’m working on a fishing project, and I’ve been testing for a while now, and as far as I can tell, the fishing spot color is a static color ( Never changes ). This is the color I use: 15714472. It’s always found it.[/quote]
awsome… i just used thecolor dab on fishing spot and i got that color and: 15382680

item.title: Best way to find a fishing spot
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I’m working on a fishing project, and I’ve been testing for a while now, and as far as I can tell, the fishing spot color is a static color ( Never changes ). This is the color I use: 15714472. It’s always found it.
